Class SeleniumScriptTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • fitnesse.testsystems.slim.tables.SlimTable
      • fitnesse.testsystems.slim.tables.ScriptTable
        • com.github.andreptb.fitnesse.plugins.SeleniumScriptTable

  • public class SeleniumScriptTable
extends fitnesse.testsystems.slim.tables.ScriptTable
    Selenium table, works just like ScriptTable, but adds extra features such as step screenshots and such
